title: BFF Christmas Tree Hairstyle And Biscuits
description: Little princesses Ava, Mia and Sophie are planning their Christmas with traditional sugar biscuits for the first time. Can you help them to make this recipe? They also need to prepare for Christmas with an awesome outfit and nice Christmas tree hairstyle, Help them and wish them a Merry Christmas!
instructions: Use mouse to control

title: Among Them Painting Book
description: Paint Among Us characters in the colors you want! Moreover, it is very easy to paint. With paint on the brush, click the image and color it. When you're done painting, you can have more fun by popping the balloons on the screen. Have fun!
instructions: LEFT CLICK

title: Hula Hoops Rush
description: Pick up the right color hula hoops and walk on! Avoid the lava pool, try to pick up as many hula hoops on the road will make you feel like a Hula QUEEN! It's really easy to learn and makes you relax. Are you ready to play it?
instructions: Slide to pick up hula hoops.

title: Zombies Shooter Part 2
description: Go to a new city filled with zombies. New types of zombies roam the streets. Mutated firefighters spew fire from their jaws. Huge mutants throw stones. Zombie football players are able to attack with lightning speed. Free the city from new hordes of zombies. Use a huge arsenal of weapons to destroy zombies. Watch the killed enemies scatter to pieces. Beware: zombies shot in the legs can crawl towards you. Save a new city!
instructions: Mouse - Look around WASD - Movement W + Shift - Run Space - Jump Left Mouse Button - Shoot Right Mouse Button (Hold) - Aim Mouse Wheel - Next / Previous Weapon 1-7 - Weapon hotkeys R - Reload G - Throw a grenade

title: Ball Sort Xmas
description: An addictive puzzle and matching game for the coming Christmas holidays. Move the balls properly to sort them into separate tubes (same color balls in the same tube). Play now! Merry Christmas!
instructions: Tap the tube to select the top ball, then tap another tube to move it there. Note: A ball can only be placed on top of another same color ball.

title: Pop it Knockout Royale
description: Tap and pop your own bubbles which you can find on the top of your hero's head. Your goal is simple but challenging, that is you have to try your best to be the first person who pops and breaks all bubbles. Are you ready?
instructions: Tap to pop the bubbles, swipe to move.

title: Train Surfers
description: Endless running game, Run - Try Train Surfers, Run as fast as you can! Train Surfing is an amazing running game for runner. Run along the chaos complex traffic and escape from the police, you know how it is in street life. Swipe to turn or use Direction keys or WASD for up, left, down and right respectively or use space bar for jump, jump and slide to avoid hitting obstacles, barrier buses and trains. Have exciting run on Bus 3D, collect coins and buy power up. Unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! Underground city adventure travel along the tracks start now,surf with your friends. Run like hell and challenge your limit. Run - Train Surfing must be a very fun run game. Play it now and start your Run - Train Surfing, join the most thrilling dash.
instructions: Use W A S D/Directional keys for Jump, left, down/slide and right respectively. Use Space Bar for jump.

title: Robber Vs Police: Fighting
description: Beat the robbers with one punch! You are a police officer. A police officer should always be ready for a fight! Keep your fist strong! You may encounter robbers in an unexpected place and time. Besides all the fighting techniques you know like boxing, kickboxing, karate or wrestling, the most important thing that will help you win is your fist! Look around, eliminate the robbers with the right move. Make sure you knock out every single one of the robbers! Robber Vs police Officer: Fighting offers offline funny and entertaining fighting game enjoyment with its 3D graphics, animations, effects and unique game simulation. Press Play button and show them how strong a police officer you are!
instructions: Multiple action fighting game such as boxing, kickboxing, karate or wrestling.

title: Freddy Run 1
description: Freddy Run 1 is a hyper casual spooky running game where you need to help a young boy named Freddy survive inside a terrifying nightmare. The action takes place inside a haunted castle where lots of deadly traps and dangerous monsters will try to take you down, yet be warned that inside each of the five levels your will also face the evil Soul Catcher. He will hunt you down continuously so be prepared as once he appears behind you and starts to pull back his sharp scythe to get ready and press the jump button in order to avoid getting knocked out. Consider to collect as much gold coins as you can, as when you reach 100 you shall be granted with an extra life.
instructions: Up - jump; Down- slide; X - shoot; P - pause;

title: Xmas Mahjong Deluxe
description: Play Xmas Mahjong Deluxe online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Warfare Area 2
description: Play Warfare Area 2 online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Winter Differences
description: Welcome to Winter Differences, a captivating spot-the-difference puzzle game! Challenge your observational skills as you seek out the distinctions between two nearly identical images. Put your hawk eyes to the test and tap the differences you spot, or use hints when needed. Remember, any unused hints and saved time will boost your bonus score. Enjoy the challenge and dive into the world of Winter Differences!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Basketball With Buddies
description: Flick the basketball into the hoop. It's that simple. Compete in real-time against your opponent. Play in real time against your friends or the computer. How many points can you score in 60 seconds?
instructions: Shoot hoops with your friends

title: Princess Cosmetic Kit Factory Makeup Maker Game
description: Welcome to princess cosmetic kit factory game where you will be making and designing makeup stuff like lipstick, nail polish and makeover boxes. Design glowing and colorful makeup products for top models, celebrities and girls who likes to look glamorous and adorable. Making makeover kit products in factory is real challenge and creative job. Play this princess cosmetic kit factory games and experience real simulator of lipstick maker and nail art designing. This best factory game also have shopping mall game play where customers can shop beauty products and then pay cash on cash register.
instructions: Become the factory worker of the best makeup kit factory in the town. Open up the factory and start crafting awesome makeover products. Barber shop, beauty parlor and shopping malls customer are waiting your best quality products so deliver them in time. Fashion spa products making process is very complicated and need best artist designer skills to do it perfectly.

title: Zombie Last Castle 2
description: Zombie Last Castle continues with its second game in the series. Although the zombies are stronger in the new game, the game can be played up to the 3rd player. Like before, the zombies are getting stronger with each wave. You have to use weapons, turret towers,mines,shield and bonuses to stop them. Whether you play 1 Player or 2-3 Player, the goal is to keep the zombies away from the building. If you can survive a total of 10 waves, you win the game!
instructions: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" Switch Gun: "Q" Go in/out Base: "E" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" Switch Gun: "." Go in/out Base: "L" Player 3: Move: "Y,G,H,L" Switch Gun: "T" Go in/out Base: "U" P.S: Use "MOUSE" to activate Weapons and Power-ups.

title: Rainbow Girls Christmas Outfits
description: Welcome to the Rainbow Girls Christmas Outfits. Rainbow girls Skyler, Sunny, Ruby, and Violet get ready for Christmas celebrations. They want to try cute Christmas outfits with crazy makeovers. Browse their wardrobe for cute outfits and pick some matching accessories. Join with these girls and enjoy this Christmas a most memorable one. Have fun!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Funny Shooter
description: Choose your weapon from the 18 available. Protect yourself from the invasion of enemies. Enemies differ in size and ability. Avoid enemy grenades and pitchforks. Dodge blows from clubs, axes, and chainsaws. Destroy enemies with a grenade launcher and a bazooka. Shoot them with machine guns and pistols. Destroy them all !!!
instructions: Mouse - Look around WASD - Movement W + Shift - Run Space - Jump Left Mouse Button - Shoot Right Mouse Button (Hold) - Aim Mouse wheel - next/leading weapon 1-7 - weapon hotkeys R - reload F - knife attack 1 Q - knife attack 2 G - throw a grenade T - inspect the weapon E - remove / remove weapon

title: Frosty Ice Cream! Icy dessert
description: Who doesn’t love ICE CREAM? That cold… sugary taste on your tongue… Aren’t you the biggest fan of ice cream EVER?! Well, devoted ice cream fan, you can now become even more devoted with this new app! What do you get when you mix SUGAR + ICE + MILK ? ICE CREAM! I Scream, You Scream, We all Scream for ICE CREAM! Make your favorite flavored ice cream! > Strawberry > Chocolate > Vanilla > Rocky Road! > Cookie Dough! Super Yummy! Super Delicious! PLAY it FREE!
instructions: You can now create ice cream easily and quickly with the tap of your fingers! Tons of ice cream flavors to choose from… and plenty more toppings to add onto them! Try many different combinations and challenge yourself. See how many awesome ice creams you can make! Start now and create a huge collection to share with your friends and your family. Show us what you've got little dessert chef! Need we say more?? JUST GET TO IT! Download now!

title: Merge Push
description: This Game is very easy and addictive to play. You should put similar numbers together to merge and make a greater number. The block numbers coming down slowly and you need to merge them before they reach down.
instructions: Click on each column to put a number block in.

title: Solitaire Klondike
description: In this HTML5 game you should put the cards in a descending order. If you do not have proper cards on the board, you can shuffle new cards and make new orders. The colors of next card should be different from the previous one. There are four places at the top of the screen. You should put Clubs, Heart, Diamond and Spades in every place in an ascending order. Your time and your moves number will be recorded and you can check them. So be careful and act quickly!!
instructions: Drag/tap solitaire cards to arrange them. You need to move the cards on top in order and win.

title: Alien Mahjong
description: Try to remove all the tiles in those 3 levels by matching at least 2 of the same tiles at once. Use the bomb mode when no matches are left to generate new ones and clean the whole level.
instructions: Use the mouse or the finger to remove matching pairs

title: Dirt Bike Extreme Parkour
description: Try to reach the shortest times in more than 40 levels in this mad stunts game, you have to be as fast as you can in the bike race. Try crazy stunts and collect stars in this dirt bike game! Upgrade your motocross bike with earned in-game gold and restart levels for new records. Physics based riding Extreme racing. Feel the stunts and obstacles, remember there is no Trial frontier! To buy new bikes you have to do somersaults as much as possible in the levels, for this you need mad skills. Buy new Motocross, BMX bikes! Update! Break the record! Stay tuned for 50+ episodes and make sure you get the highest score on all levels until then.
instructions: WASD or Arrow Keys

title: Draw Bullet Master
description: Now we need a SWAT to rescue a hostage on the rooftop. Draw Bullet Master needs you to draw several safe bullet track to eliminate all terrorists without hurting hostages. With 3D physics designs, we'd better use your first bullet to shoot them all down, or else the guners will shoot you down!
instructions: Drag to play.

title: Zombies Shooter Part 1
description: The zombie virus has swept the city. Zombies roam the streets and take refuge in houses. Free the city from hordes of zombies. Use a huge arsenal of weapons to destroy zombies. Watch as killed enemies are scattered to pieces. Beware: zombies shot in the legs can crawl towards you. Save your city!
instructions: Mouse - look around WASD - movement W + Shift - Run Space - jump Left Mouse Button - Shoot Right Mouse Button (Hold) - Aim Mouse Wheel - Next / Previous Weapon 1-7 - weapon hotkeys R - reload G - throw a grenade

title: Round 6: The Game
description: If you are a Squid Game fan, this game will more than sure be on your top games. After playing levels like Red Light, Green Light, or Marble, is the time to play all the levels and rounds from the real show! In this amazing game, you will have 7 Rounds to complete, including Red Light - Green Light, Marble, Glass Tower, Rope Tower, The Big Fight, Honeycomb, and the last game - Squid Game! What do you think about this stunning game?
instructions: Use your mouse or touchscreen to play. When fighting or running from PC, you can press M for a boost.

title: Christmas Tiles
description: Clear the board of the Christmas tiles by making matches of 3 or more like items that are adjacent to each other. Get Magic Snowflakes that can be used to destroy tiles when no matches are available.
instructions: Click on groups of tiles to remove them from the board.

title: Parking Man
description: It's time to open your own business, but not enough money? You need to work a little as a parking attendant, but be careful! This should be done very carefully and carefully, because there are a lot of obstacles and dangers in these parking lots! Can you park all the cars without breaking them?
instructions: Mouse click or touch screen to park car in empty place

title: Shooting Balls
description: Shooting Balls is a casual and super fun game. The objective is to destroy as many blocks as possible and reach the highest score. Challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score!
instructions: Mouse click or touch the screen.

title: Advent Mahjong
description: Advent Mahjong is a connect Mahjong in Cristmas setting. By passing a level you get one day closer to Cristmas and the closer you get the more challenging the levels are.
instructions: Clear the game field by clicking on pairs of identical tiles. Tiles can be removed only if between them you can draw not more than 3 lines. You can rotate the tiles by clicking on the boxes with rotation sign and move the tiles by pressing on the arrows.

title: Super Car CHASE
description: Super Car CHASE brings you ultimate joy to race against the enemy cars and have fun. Game offer amazing Racing experience through the Snowy terrains, grass lands and inside the desert areas. Earn coins and unlock the cars Race against the AI Don't get caught by the enemy cars
instructions: PC: Use A-D or Right and Left arrow keys to move the player car Mobile: Press on right and left of the screen to move the player car

title: Funny Battle Simulator
description: Control a huge army. Take command over infantry and archers. Send Cyclops and Spartans into battle. Watch your grenadiers throw grenades at enemies. Control the great Zeus and throw lightning. Crush all enemies. Show your tactical skills. Prove that you are the best general in the world!
instructions: Left Mouse Button - Create Unit Right Mouse Button + CTRL - Delete Unit WASD - standard movement WASD + Right Mouse Button (Hold) - Alternative Move Shift - speed up the movement Q / E - Rotate the camera

title: Ultra Pixel Burgeria
description: Create your homemade burgers and serve your customers in this amazing burger simulation game with over 30 burgers and 16 stages with real-life mechanics!
instructions: Press A or D to move screen Use the mouse to move the ingredients and assemble the hamburger.

title: Slendrina X The Dark Hospital
description: Play Slendrina X The Dark Hospital online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: zBall 3 Football
description: Don’t let the ball fall down and complete the levels collecting all the little flags. They will increase your score, giving you the possibility to buy your favorite teams! In this 3D world you can see lots of traps, be attentive about the crossings. Turn the ball direction according to the platforms. Can you score 1000 points?
instructions: Tap the screen to steer left or right. Collect flags as currency to spend in the store and build up your favorite team. Don't fall or you will lose!

title: City Driver Steal Cars
description: Explore a huge open world! The streets of the city are full of car traffic. Steal cars! Take them to your garage for sale. Find all kinds of cars. Drift along the roads. Crash into other cars. Steal police cars. Become the grand auto thief!
instructions: WSAD - Moving / Driving Spacebar - Handbrake C - Change the view of the camera Shift - Nitro F - Get in / Out of the car

title: Squid Coloring Book
description: This is a Squid coloring book, where he exercise her imagination and motor skills while having fun meeting different characters. In this game you will find 12 different pictures which have to be colored. You have 11 different colors to choose. You can also save the colored image. Have fun!
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Parking Harder
description: If you find a skillful game, this game is designed for you. Use the arrow key to move the car to the parking place. Sound is easy? No. You need to focus to move the car safely, a small mistake will move you to the start point.
instructions: Use the arrow key to move the car. When the car moves safely to the parking place, you will pass the level.

title: Zombie Last Castle
description: Zombie Last Castle is a tower defense game that can be played by 1 Player or 2 Player. You must protect the building from the zombies that come in waves. With each wave, the zombies are getting stronger. That's why you should take advantage of Power-ups and improve your weapons. Whether you play 1 Player or 2 Player, the goal is to keep the zombies away from the building. If you can survive a total of 10 waves, you win the game!
instructions: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" Switch Gun: "Q" Go in/out Base: "F" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" Switch Gun: "P" Go in/out Base: "L" P.S: Use "MOUSE" to activate Weapons and Power-ups.

title: Coloring Book Glittered Unicorns
description: Welcome to the magical world of the unicorns! Paint unicorns in glitter and pastel colors. We're sure you'll have a lot of fun in this game, which features 12 different glitter, 12 different pastel colors!
instructions: LEFT CLICK or TOUCH

title: Squid Sniper Game
description: Detect and destroy players moving in green light-red light game using your sniper gun! When aiming, you have to make sure you hit the right player. You earn points for the correct player, but if you hit the wrong player, your points will decrease. Get the highest score at the end of the game and compete with your friends. Play Squid Game Sniper now and start the action!
instructions: Mouse lock/unlock = L, Sniper moves = Mouse, Zoom = Right click, Fire = Left click, Zoom in/out = Mouse Wheel

title: Time Shooter
description: Time only moves with you. When you are inactive, the world slows down. You can look around, plan your further actions. Only by starting to move will you start time again. Dodge bullets in slow motion like Neo. Crush all enemies. without taking damage!
instructions: WASD - move Left Mouse Button - Shoot / Throw Weapon Right Mouse Button - Pick Up Weapon

title: Ludo Kingdom Online
description: Have fun with friends by playing Ludo Kingdom Online game. The game has 3 modes: - Vs Bot: Playing against the computer (offline) - Online: Playing with randomly matched people - Private: Playing with your friends. Simply share a private code and connect to each other. Play now!
instructions: Tap to roll a dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board.

title: Paper Fold Online
description: Play Paper Fold Online online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Imposter Night Race
description: The race begins at dusk! Imposter Night Race, which is a 3D computer game with a unique running simulation and rich visual effects, consists of 10 different sections prepared with neon lights. Compete with US characters at dusk, get ahead of other runners by overcoming obstacles. While you progress on the parkour that fun from each other, you can stumble and fall. Get up and keep running! Complete all the parkour successfully and be the hero of the race! A simple and fun running game Imposter Night Race is suitable for kids. Come on, press Play and start this exciting race!
instructions: Hello Master runners! Races begin at the twilight world! Is your puppet ready?

title: Riddles of Squid
description: Introducing an exciting new game based on the acclaimed Korean TV series. You have to play as a brave girl who wants to win the main prize. Use your luck and skills to win. And at the end you will receive a reward - you can choose cool outfits, hairstyles and makeup for your heroine. Hurry up - play this addicting game and solve all the Riddles Of Squid!
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.

title: Besties Random Clothing
description: Princesses Mia, Ava and Emma feel boredom, so they have to plan their day interestingly. So, they randomly select their outfits and tasks for the day. Let's help the princess to choose the Maid, Princess and Fairy style outfits and cleaning task. Come and join our princesses to enjoy this day. Have fun!
instructions: Use mouse only

title: Squidly Game Tug Of War
description: Play Squidly Game Tug Of War online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Yummy Taco
description: Do you like eating taco? In this game you have to make your delicious taco! Start from scratch and make the dough, tortilla, and cook the beef meat. Fill your taco with some fresh veggies and sauce. Make the tastiest taco in your town and serve to your customers.
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Spin Soccer 3
description: Spin Soccer 3 is a puzzle/physics game in which you rotate the platforms, avoid spikes and get the ball to the goal soccer. Complete all levels in this new version and become in the best of Spin Soccer, be carful is not an easy.
instructions: - Use Left/Right to Rotate. - Touch Left/Right side to rotate.

title: Waterpark Slide Race
description: Do you want to overlook the world from the vantage point of ever wandering clouds? If your answers are affirmative, you will find much joy in playing this game as you discover that how tailored it is for your pursuit of height.
instructions: Click or tap to control
